title: Ayanna Pressley
summary: Ayanna Soyini Pressley (born February 3, 1974) is an American politician who has been serving as the U.S. Representative for Massachusetts's 7th congressional district since 2019. Her district includes the northern three quarters of Boston, most of Cambridge, and parts of Milton, as well as all of Chelsea, Everett, Randolph, and Somerville.[1]
